------------------------------------------------------------------------

![](reference/figures/hex.png)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

*version 0.3.0*

**scrubletR** is a native R implementation of the original. We feel that
the R implentation provides sufficiently similar results to the Python
but there are small differences. Please read
[this](https://furlan-lab.github.io/scrubletR/articles/ImplementationHassles.html)
to learn more. To read more about the original work, please read the
paper:

*Wolock SL, Lopez R, Klein AM. Scrublet: Computational Identification of
Cell Doublets in Single-Cell Transcriptomic Data. Cell Syst. 2019 Apr
24;8(4):281-291.e9. doi: 10.1016/j.cels.2018.11.005. Epub 2019 Apr 3.
PMID: 30954476; PMCID: PMC6625319. [linked
here](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2405471218304745)*

**Visit
[HowTo](https://furlan-lab.github.io/scrubletR/articles/QuickStart.html)
for quick start**

## Acknowledgements

Written by Scott Furlan.

![](reference/figures/furlan_lab_logo.png)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Package index

## wrapper function

scrublet for Seurat and monocle3

- [`scrublet()`](https://furlan-lab.github.io/scrubletR/reference/Scrublet.md)
  : Scrublet

## scrubletR innards

R6 ScrubletR Class

- [`ScrubletR`](https://furlan-lab.github.io/scrubletR/reference/ScrubletR.md)
  : Scrublet R6 Class
